Thanks a lot for contributing to the project!

• Chain results: the effect will be %1$s in the day of %2$s.
• Link %1$d: %2$s%3$s executes an action%4$s %5$s, and that causes a reaction in %6$s (%7$s karma; %8$s total karma).

Some functions will be disabled due to a denied contact permission.
Please, consider donating some money for the app development, that would allow me to make this app even better! Google Play Store applies a tax percentage depending on your country.

Keeps the screen on while the app is active
Enables and allows to configure audio (sounds, voice) from the app
Enables particle generation within the app
Enables a TTS voice that reads texts in the app
Hides the navigation drawer when an item is selected
Keeps form data even after closing the app
Allows the fortune-teller to say opinions about other people
Allows the fortune-teller to say common phrases
Change the time between each phrase from the fortune-teller
Allows the app to save the form data from enquiries
Allows the app to save the entered names so they can be shown as suggestions
Use a seed to generate the aspect and messages from the fortune-teller
Sticks the enquiry panel to the top of the screen so it is always visible
Change the text type that can be read in the app
Change the time between each prediction update

string-array.name: astrological_house
string-array.item: 11th – House of Friendships. Friends and acquaintances of like-minded attitudes. Groups, clubs and societies. Higher associations. Benefits and fortunes from career. One\'s hopes and wishes.

12th – House of Self-Undoing. Mysticism and mystery. Places of seclusion such as hospitals, prisons and institutions, including self-imposed imprisonments. Things which are not apparent to self, yet clearly seen by others. Elusive, clandestine, secretive or unbeknownst matters. Privacy, retreat, reflection, and self-sacrifice. Unconscious/subconscious, dreams. Unknown enemies.
1st – House of Self. Physical appearance, traits and characteristics. First impressions. General outlook into the world. Ego. Beginnings and initiatives.
2nd – House of Value. Material and immaterial things of certain subValue. Money. Belongings, property, acquisitions. Cultivation and growth. Substance. Self-worth.

3rd – House of Communications. Early education and childhood environment. Communication. Happiness. Intelligence. Achievements. Siblings. Neighborhood matters. Short, local travel, and transportation.
4th – House of Home and Family. Ancestry, heritage, roots. Early foundation and environment. Mother or mothers as figure. The caretaker of the household. Comfort. Cyclic end of matters.
5th – House of Pleasure. Recreational and leisure activities. Things which makes for enjoyment and entertainment. Games and gambling. Children. Love and romance. Creative self-expression.

6th – House of Health. Routine tasks and duties. Skills or training acquired. Jobs and Employments. Health and overall well-being. Service performed for others. Caretaking. Pets and small domestic animals.

7th – House of Partnerships. Close, confidante-like relationships. Marriage and business partners. Agreements and treaties. Matters dealing with diplomatic relations of all kinds, including open (known) enemies. Attraction to qualities we admire from the other partner.

8th – House of Reincarnation. Cycles of Deaths And Rebirth. Sexual relationships and deeply committed relationships of all kinds. Joint funds, finances. Other person\'s resource. Occult, psychic and taboo matters. Regeneration. Self-transformation.
9th – House of Philosophy. Foreign travel and foreign countries. Culture. Long distance travels and journeys. Religion. Law and ethics. Higher education. Knowledge. Experience through expansion.

10th – House of Social Status. Ambitions. Motivations. Career. Status in society. Government. Authority. Father or father figure. The breadwinner of the household. One\'s public appearance/impression at-large (audience).

string-array.name: compatibility
string-array.item: Scorpio, Taurus, Cancer, Sagittarius, Virgo, Capricorn.
Taurus, Gemini, Scorpio, Leo, Libra, Cancer.

string-array.name: divination
string-array.item: Something {rand:∅; favorable; unfavorable}, related to a certain thing ({method:getNounWithArticle}), will happen.
You will get {rand:∅; good; bad; rare} news about something ({method:getNounWithArticle}).
You will get {rand:∅; good; bad; rare} news, related to {string:divination_middle}, from {string:unspecific_person}.
You will get {rand:∅; good; bad; rare} news about {string:divination_middle}.
A {string:situation_descriptor} event, related to something ({method:getNounWithArticle}), will happen.
You\'re gonna have problems with a person whose sign is {string:astrological_sign}.
A person, whose sign is {string:astrological_sign}, will help you with your problems.
A person, whose sign is {string:astrological_sign}, will {rand:harm; benefit; help; abandon; ignore; notice} you.
A person, whose sign is {string:astrological_sign}, will affect you {rand:negatively; positively} in {string:divination_middle}.
You are in a moment where you have to make {rand:∅; critical; hasty; important; well-thought; necessary; essential} decisions about {string:divination_middle}.
In this moment others see you as a/an {string:personality_trait} person.
I {rand:see; perceive; visualize; contemplate} an image of {string:augury_entity} ⸠string:augury_situation⸡.

string-array.name: divination_appendix
string-array.item: Some keywords, related to this divination, are:
Some things that I can perceive, and that are part of divination, are:
These things also appear during the divination:
These things are part of the divination:
This is related to the divination:
This also appears in the divination:
This is related to the previously mentioned:
These things are related to the aforesaid:
This also appears in the divination:

string-array.name: divination_cause
string-array.item: It seems that this could be due to {string:divination_causative_factor}.
Possibly it may be due to {string:divination_causative_factor}.
It is presumed that this could be caused by {string:divination_causative_factor}.
One could say that this is caused by {string:divination_causative_factor}.
If I\'m not mistaken, this is due to {string:divination_causative_factor}.
I think this is due to {string:divination_causative_factor}.
I guess the above is caused by {string:divination_causative_factor}.
I can {rand:see; perceive; perceive; detect; feel; observe; note} that this is due to {string:divination_causative_factor}.
It can be said that the {rand:reason; cause; circumstance; reason} of this could be {string:explicit_cause; gender:⸮}.
I can see that the {rand:reason; cause; circumstance; reason} of this might be {string:explicit_cause; gender:⸮}.
The {rand:responsible; cause; motive} of this could be {string:unspecific_person; gender:⸮}.
The divination says that, possibly, the cause of this is {string:person; gender:⸮}.
I can {rand:see; perceive; detect; sense; feel; observe; note} in this {rand:fortune; divination; prediction; augury} that {string:individual; gender:⸮} could be the one who causes this.
It is possible that {string:individual; gender:⸮} has something to do with it.

string-array.name: divination_end
string-array.item: will be affected in a positive way.
will be affected in a negative way.
will be OK, or will get fixed or be repaired.
won\'t be OK, or will be damaged.
won\'t be fine, or will be as in the worst-case scenario.
won\'t be affected in any way.
will be adversely affected or diminished.
will bring solutions or wellness to other people.
will cause troubles or harm to other people.
will increase or strengthen {rand:∅; although gradually; suddenly; all of a sudden; slowly; a bit; a lot}.
will decrease or deteriorate {rand:∅; although gradually; suddenly; all of a sudden; slowly; a bit; a lot}.
will bring good results, benefits or advantages in other areas of your life.꘎
will bring bad results, drawbacks or disadvantages in other areas of your life.꘎

string-array.name: divination_middle
string-array.item: your {rand:finances; wealth; financial resources; financial gains}
your {rand:sanity; mental dexterity; mental health; intelligence; common sense}
the dependence from, or on, other people
your {rand:might; authority; dominion; influence on others}
your {rand:sense of purpose; meaning of life}
the achievement of objectives related to {string:divination_middle}

string-array.name: divination_start
string-array.item: At any time of the day

string-array.name: explicit_cause
string-array.item: actions made in a distant past
actions not made in the past
ideas that pass through your head right now
influences of the divine or from higher forces

string-array.name: foreboding_start
string-array.item: What you think will {rand:∅; not} happen,
What you {rand:expect the most; least expect}

string-array.name: individual
string-array.item: a person of the same age

string-array.name: opinion
string-array.item: Have you heard about {method:getFormattedName}? They are my worst enemy.
You look like someone I know, their name is {method:getFormattedName}.
I have to go with {method:getFormattedName}. They owe me money.
Have you seen a person named {method:getFormattedName}?
Your {string:relative; gender:⸮}, {method:getFormattedName} and I are lovers. A real love triangle.
Are you {string:relative; gender:⛌} of {method:getFormattedName}? You look very much alike.
Are you, by chance, {string:relative; gender:⛌} of {method:getFormattedName}? You both share certain traits.
It\'s nice to see you here, unlike {method:getFormattedName}.
Oh, yes, I revealed a frightening future for {method:getFormattedName}.
The other day {method:getFormattedName} asked me to look into their future.
So many tragic stories have been written, like the ones from {method:getFormattedName}.
Revealing the future is exhausting, and even more so the future of {method:getFormattedName}.
Many people turn to me, especially {method:getFormattedName}, {method:getFormattedName} and {method:getFormattedName}.
Did you know that {method:getFormattedName} and {method:getFormattedName} are a couple?
There is a very cruel fate between {method:getFormattedName} and {method:getFormattedName}.
A strong rivalry is building between {method:getFormattedName} and {method:getFormattedName}.
Do you want to know what happened to {method:getFormattedName}?
{method:getFormattedName} came to me for my secret knowledge.
Beware of {method:getFormattedName}, they are a very dangerous person.
There is a very nice person named {method:getFormattedName}.
I like food, especially that made by {method:getFormattedName}.
There are two people in this world whom you should know. They are {method:getFormattedName} and {method:getFormattedName}.
I have many brothers and sisters, and my favorite is {method:getFormattedName}.
Never go to talk to {method:getFormattedName}, they\'re very annoying.
Yes, have you seen {method:getFormattedName}? I need to talk to this person.

Let\'s see, uh, {method:getFormattedName}, {method:getFormattedName}, {method:getFormattedName}, {method:getFormattedName}, {method:getFormattedName}, uh… and {method:getFormattedName}. That\'s it, I\'ve written down the ones I need to predict their future.
If you misbehave, {method:getFormattedName} will come and take you away.
Have you heard the sad story of {method:getFormattedName}?
Have you heard the adventures of {method:getFormattedName}?
Have you heard the good news about {method:getFormattedName}?
Would you mind letting me figure out something about {method:getFormattedName}?
Do you like a person named {method:getFormattedName}?
Tell me if you ever see {method:getFormattedName}.
Tell me if one day you meet {method:getFormattedName}.
I am a very busy person. Today I\'m going out with {method:getFormattedName}.
{method:getFormattedName} and {method:getFormattedName} hate each other too much.
{method:getFormattedName} and {method:getFormattedName} understand each other very well.
I need to find {method:getFormattedName}. They owe me money.
I\'m looking for {method:getFormattedName}. Have you seen them?
It seems that {method:getFormattedName} has an awful destiny.
I think {method:getFormattedName} has a good future.
Do you think I\'m not real? {method:getFormattedName} thinks otherwise.
Somewhere, {method:getFormattedName} is making plans that will benefit us.
{method:getFormattedName} always has good things to say about {method:getFormattedName}.
There are many people to whom I give predictions, but {method:getFormattedName} is the one I do most.
Do you know the legend of {method:getFormattedName}?
Fate once indicated that {method:getFormattedName} and {method:getFormattedName} would meet, and so they did.
{method:getFormattedName} has no longer communicated with me, and it is worrisome.
{method:getFormattedName} is going to do bad things today.
{method:getFormattedName} will do something very good on this day.
This existence has very curious things, one of them is a person named {method:getFormattedName}.
Don\'t interrupt me, I\'m watching the life of {method:getFormattedName}.
It\'s interesting to see what happens with {method:getFormattedName}.
Quiet! Let me see what happens with {method:getFormattedName}.
Stop! I need to know what\'s happening with {method:getFormattedName}.
Hey! I have to know what will happen to {method:getFormattedName}.
No, no, no, everything is wrong with {method:getFormattedName}.
And such is the sad life of {method:getFormattedName}.
Wow! You should see how amazing the life of {method:getFormattedName} is.
Seeing the future is fun. I like, mainly, to see what happens in the life of {method:getFormattedName}.
There is a strong tension between {method:getFormattedName} and {method:getFormattedName}.
{method:getFormattedName} and {method:getFormattedName} apparently hate each other, although they really love each other.
If I had a coin every time {method:getFormattedName} said something stupid, I\'d be a millionaire.
If I had a coin for every clever thing {method:getFormattedName} says, I\'d be owing money.
It seems that things are going badly between {method:getFormattedName} and {method:getFormattedName}.
Things will go wrong between {method:getFormattedName} and {method:getFormattedName}.
{method:getFormattedName} tries to cause trouble between {method:getFormattedName} and {method:getFormattedName}.
{method:getFormattedName} is a very nice person. You should treat them.
Yeah, I got it. Here is the fate of {method:getFormattedName}.
You should see what {method:getFormattedName} is doing.
It seems that {method:getFormattedName} is doing bad things.
In order to face their destiny, {method:getFormattedName} does things that they think will avoid it.
Hardly anyone can escape their destiny, especially {method:getFormattedName}.
Do you believe in destiny? {method:getFormattedName} once managed to get away with it and avoid it.
The future is something unprecedented, especially for {method:getFormattedName}.
I need to see {method:getFormattedName}. It is urgent.
Have you seen {method:getFormattedName}? I have to tell them something.
If you see {method:getFormattedName} ask them to pay me.
Do you want to hear about {method:getFormattedName}?
Be careful with {method:getFormattedName}, they are harmful to those around them.
You should see {method:getFormattedName}, they\'re very nice.
Honestly, I\'m tired of predicting the future for {method:getFormattedName}.
Do you want to know what happened to {method:getFormattedName}?
Calm down! You will find out soon what will happen to you. I must see what {method:getFormattedName} will live.
I need to say something to {method:getFormattedName}!
No, it\'s very sad what happens with {method:getFormattedName}, {method:getFormattedName}, {method:getFormattedName} and {method:getFormattedName}.
If I could gather a bunch of fools, I would choose {method:getFormattedName}, {method:getFormattedName}, {method:getFormattedName} and {method:getFormattedName}.
The best group to go out with is {method:getFormattedName}, {method:getFormattedName}, {method:getFormattedName} and {method:getFormattedName}.
It\'s always good to hear the advice given by {method:getFormattedName}.
I\'m better than a person named {method:getFormattedName}.
{method:getFormattedName} does not have a good future ahead of them.
{method:getFormattedName} will have a life full of happiness.
{method:getFormattedName} will have a life with sorrows.
{method:getFormattedName} will welcome fortune with open arms.
Misfortune will be part of the life of {method:getFormattedName}.
Examples of totally different destinies would be those of {method:getFormattedName} and {method:getFormattedName}.
Do you know what will happen with {method:getFormattedName}?
It seems that {method:getFormattedName} and {method:getFormattedName} belong to each other.
Well, well, {method:getFormattedName} has a good omen.
Prophecy indicates that {method:getFormattedName} is the chosen one.
I have a feeling you\'ve crossed paths with {method:getFormattedName}.
I have very good news for {method:getFormattedName}.
There is very bad news about {method:getFormattedName}.
The prophecy says that {method:getFormattedName} will be successful.
{method:getFormattedName} is the person mentioned in the prophecy.
The omen shows that {method:getFormattedName} will have a long life.
The omen says that {method:getFormattedName} will have a good life.
{method:getFormattedName} and {method:getFormattedName} are people who don\'t get along with each other.
{method:getFormattedName} and {method:getFormattedName} share lives marked by conflict.
Life makes sure that {method:getFormattedName} fails over and over again.
A winning streak has been predestined for {method:getFormattedName}.
{method:getFormattedName} is going to have a normal life.
{method:getFormattedName} is going to have a trouble-free life.
{method:getFormattedName} will have a life fraught with difficulty, yet their reward will be great.
It says here that {method:getFormattedName} has committed many crimes.
The secret life of {method:getFormattedName} is very frightening.
Apparently {method:getFormattedName} is a good person, but everything indicates the opposite.
The life of {method:getFormattedName} will take a complete turn.
{method:getFormattedName} will have a life full of intrigue and suspense.
As the omen indicates, {method:getFormattedName} will be a successful person.
The future reveals good and bad things, but {method:getFormattedName} seems to have the simplest life.
The fate of {method:getFormattedName} is really complex.
They say that {method:getFormattedName} will do such incredible things that will change society.

string-array.name: psychological_type
string-array.item: Reflexive introvert: The reflexive introvert is a person with great intellectual activity, but who, however, has difficulties relating or interacting with other people. They tend to be stubborn and tenacious when it comes to achieving their objectives. Sometimes they are seen as misfits and harmless, yet interesting.

Sentimental introvert: The sentimental introvert personality type corresponds with solitary people who have great difficulty establishing social relationships with other people. They can be unsociable and melancholy. They do everything within their power to go unnoticed, and they like to remain silent. However, they are very sensitive to the needs of others.

Perceptive introvert: It’s a type of personality commonly found in artists and musicians. Perceptive introvert people put special emphasis on sensory experiences. They give color, shape and texture great subValue. They belong to the world of shapes as a source of internal experiences.

Intuitive introvert: These people are extremely sensitive to the most subtle stimuli. Intuitive introverts correspond to the type of people who can almost guess what others are thinking, feeling or willing to do. They are imaginative, dreamers and idealists. They struggle with “keeping their feet on the ground”.

Reflexive extrovert: The reflexive extrovert personality corresponds with the objective brainy individuals, whose actions are almost exclusively based on reason. They only accept as true the things that they can confirm with enough evidence. They are not very sensitive and can even be tyrannical and manipulative towards other people.

Sentimental extrovert: The people who fall into this category have a great ability to understand others and establish social relationships. However, they struggle to separate themselves from the herd and suffer when they are ignored by the people around them. They are very skilled at communication.

Perceptive extrovert: Perceptive extrovert individuals have a special weakness for objects, to which they can even attribute magical qualities, though they may do so unconsciously. They aren’t passionate about ideas, but rather about the way these ideas take the shape of concrete things. They seek out pleasure above all things.

Intuitive extrovert: This corresponds to the typical adventurer. Intuitive extroverts are very active and restless. They need a lot of stimuli all of the time. They are tenacious when it comes to achieving their objectives, and once they do, they go right on to the next goal quickly forgetting the previous one. They don’t care much about the well-being of those around them.
